is used to capture the continuation. (-> [[IntermediateLanguage]])

The captured continuation is invoked by [[op_nuate]].

h1. format

<pre><code>["conti", <FIXME>, <opecodes_next>]</code></pre>

h1. example

program:
<pre><code>(call/cc func)</code></pre>

compiled:
<pre><code>[frame
   [conti 0
   [argument
   [constant 1
   [argument
   [refer-global "func"
   [apply]]]]]]
[halt]]</code></pre>
